chunks.en: Is it love if I think of her every hour or every ten minutes?
I know a girl, and I think of her every day when there's nothing special I need to focus on;
But it's not the kind of thing where I'm constantly looking for her?
Avoidant attachment style?
I'm not curious about what she's doing, I just simply think of her;
If I think of her often every day, do I like her?
You're just horny, focus on making money, you'll have everything when you're rich, if not, go get a foot massage.
Spring is here, all things recover, it's the season for animals to reproduce again, the air in the forest is filled with the scent of hormones! ðŸ˜†
Masturbate hard three times, if you still have the same thought then it's true love.
Requesting the person below to post the Zhu Yuanzhang godfather meme.
You said that holding hands is called a promise.

@M48A1 Isn't it clear? She's an object you project your affection onto, you're in love with your fantasy. You don't even understand her, you're just projecting qualities and emotions you like onto that person. If you don't want to break the illusion, then don't think about it, let her be a dream lover, don't go looking for her and then wake up from the dream.
Confess boldly, if you fail, go get a prostitute.
It's just spring, if there were more pretty girls in your circle, you wouldn't just think about one every day (doge).
@wegbjwjm It's this horny stage, and then among all the people I've met before, I only think about one.
Just horny, it'll be fine after a while without contact.
The feeling of being in love.
Get to know more girls.
Yes, if you like her, confess.

@YGHMXFAL @daybreakfangyang @fanersai @jasonlwy @keengrass @reoah2 @slowmist Got a reply: 'Stop pretending, stop pretending, showing off will get you struck by lightning.' If I already liked her before, now I'm head over heels in love.
Chat, if she doesn't mind, continue, if she minds, then back off.
@kulous I just chatted with her a bit more some time ago and have known her for a while. If it's just me being horny, then I need to think carefully, I can't affect others.
@M48A1 Then go out for dinner, movies, play... If she doesn't mind, confess, if you can't get her out, give up.
Maybe you're just simply lusting after her body.

I read a book before: > I'm really sorry, during the quarantine, I also had some vague hooligan dreams and 'released the water.' Outside the dream I am a counter-revolutionary, in the dream I am a hooligan. Because I do mental labor during the day, 'writing' work, I can't sleep very well. When I'm sleepless, I think more about the beautiful female workers in the factory, I think about this one tonight, that one the next night, I'm quite consistent every night.
